ffhs.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ffhs.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    saves a players data The player tokens belong here, the Color, the tokens and the names.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Basic Constructor
      Player(Color c, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor places Color and Player names.
      Player(Color c, java.lang.String name, int size)
      Constructor places Color and Names and generates the same tokens for both players.
